Title: To control SARS,  health workers should consider the "four earlies" as most important
Designer: Huang Yijiu (黄一九)Mei Zhihao (梅志浩)
Publisher: Hunan kexue jishu chubanshe (湖南科学技术出版社)
Notes: The "four earlies" (四早) are: Early discovery, early reporting, early isolation, early treatment measures.
